mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (USER_ID_NO, PAYMENT_METHOD, ORDER_PRICE, ORDER_COUNT, RECEIVER_NAME, PHONE_NUMBER, ZIPCODE, ADDRESS, ORDER_REQUIRED, ORDER_STATUS) VALUES ( #{userIdNo}, #{paymentMethod}, #{orderPrice}, #{orderCount}, #{receiverName}, #{phoneNumber}, #{zipcode}, #{address}, #{orderRequired}, #{orderStatus} );
mapper.select: SELECT p.PRODUCT_ID, p.PRODUCT_NAME, p.PRODUCT_PRICE, #{productCount} as PRODUCT_COUNT, p.PRODUCT_DISCOUNT, i1.IMAGE_URL FROM product p JOIN image i1 ON i1.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID WHERE p.PRODUCT_ID = #{productId} AND i1.IMAGE_ID = ( SELECT MIN(i2.IMAGE_ID) FROM image i2 WHERE i2.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID )

SELECT p.PRODUCT_ID, p.PRODUCT_NAME, c.PRODUCT_PRICE, c.PRODUCT_COUNT, c.PRODUCT_DISCOUNT, i1.IMAGE_URL FROM cart c JOIN product p ON p.PRODUCT_ID = c.PRODUCT_ID JOIN image i1 ON i1.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID WHERE p.PRODUCT_ID = #{productId} AND i1.IMAGE_ID = ( SELECT MIN(i2.IMAGE_ID) FROM image i2 WHERE i2.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID )
